name: Dimensions (itch) (Creatively Bad)
description:
Current Version: Demo Version 3.4

Demo of a game I'm working on. Leave any bug reports or feedback in the comments of the page.

I recommend downloading the game over playing it in the web browser if you can.

Notes:
  • The volume controls in the options menu do not work as the game doesn't have any sound yet. Sound will  be coming in a future update
  • The grappling hook is still in the game and works it's just not used on any of the current levels in the game
  • Issue where when you jump on some of the stalactites and stalagmites you hit a collider
Controls:

Left Mouse: Shoot

Right Mouse: Prepare Grapple

A + D: Left/Right Movement

Space: Jump

Ctrl: Go To Grapple Position

Shift: Move Down Platform

P or Escape: Pause
